title: Daily Data Corruption
body: Every singe day that i play a few matches, the game crashes. I can never reconnect and always have to close the game and reopen. Every single time it says i have possible data corruption and then it fixes it. by this time the match has been ff'd and i'm now at a 10 minute low priority timer because of this issue. it's been a problem for a long time now, but now i've been playing ranked, it has tilted me.......

replies.body:
If you are experiencing crashes due to data corruption, perform a client repair by clicking the question mark on the top right of your launcher. If a client repair is how you said it was fixing it or it doesn't work, you may need to do a clean reinstall; download the [Hextech Repair Tool on this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), select the 'Uninstall' and 'Clean Reinstall' options and run it. This will take longer than a repair, but is completely thorough and may fix your issue.

For further assistance with crashes, please refer to the [Bug Splat & Game Crashes guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).
Still having the problem only made it through 1 game this time
What troubleshooting steps did you take?

Installed the Repair tool, did the clean reinstall. Played a match(after the first of my 5, 10minute low priority ques). got past the draft in a new game and at that load screen is when it always crashes, mentions something about internet connection after i try to reconnect

Thanks for troubleshooting all of this!  Crashing is a very loose term, so it's hard to say what the issue was without more exact details about what you're actually seeing.  Catching up here, it looks like you might have solved the corrupt data issue, and experiencing another lingering issue at this point.  If the loading screen isn't appearing or if you just see a black screen then your network might be having trouble establishing a connection to our game server.  

Go over the steps in [our connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  I highly recommend testing it out in custom games to avoid further lower priority queues.  Let me know the results!

no i still get the data corruption message after i close and re open the game. I get to that loading screen with all the champion portraits, i get a bug splat, i try to reconnect, the screen goes black, i tab out and see the connectivity issue problem. Close the message, close the game, reopen the game and 'fix the data corruption'

Thanks for the follow up!  Hit us up in a[ support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so our tech team can take a deeper look into what's going on.  I also recommend gathering a set of logs to help give that context via our [hextech repair tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)  Attach it to your  ticket, and we'll respond as soon as possible!
